mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_ID AS ARTIST_ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_KAKAO_PROFILE_URL AS KAKAO_PROFILE_URL, M.MEMBER_PROFILE_NAME AS PROFILE_NAME, M.MEMBER_PROFILE_PATH AS PROFILE_PATH, A.ARTIST_BLOG_NAME AS BLOG_NAME, A.ARTIST_DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, A.BLOG_IMG_NAME, A.BLOG_IMG_PATH, (SELECT COUNT(S.ARTIST_ID) FROM TBL_SUBSCRIPTION S WHERE S.ARTIST_ID = A.MEMBER_ID) AS SUBSCRIPTION_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(P.ID) FROM TBL_POST P WHERE P.ID = A.MEMBER_ID AND P.POST_STATUS = 'READABLE') AS POST_COUNT FROM TBL_MEMBER M JOIN TBL_ARTIST A on M.ID = A.MEMBER_ID WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{artistId}
